name: Accountant
description: AI can automate bookkeeping and tax preparation, but complex financial planning and regulatory interpretation still require human expertise.

name: Customer Service Representative
description: AI chatbots and voice assistants are increasingly capable of handling customer queries, especially for standardized issues. Human reps are still needed for complex or emotionally sensitive interactions.

name: Construction Worker
description: Physical labor, adaptability to changing environments, and safety considerations make this role difficult to automate with current AI and robotics.

name: Data Entry Clerk
description: AI and automation tools can process, extract, and input data far faster and more accurately than humans, making this role highly susceptible to replacement.

name: Graphic Designer
description: AI tools can generate images, logos, and layouts quickly, but lack the nuanced creativity and brand understanding that human designers bring. AI may replace basic design tasks but not high-level creative direction.

name: Software Engineer
description: Currently AI can write code, however it is not always the best code or even correct code, usually a programmer paired with AI can be a more efficient programmer, however at least for now, AI is not a solve of the problem, merely a tool to aid the engineers.

name: Teacher
description: While AI can assist with personalized learning and grading, the human connection, mentorship, and classroom management provided by teachers are difficult to replicate.

name: Truck Driver
description: Autonomous vehicle technology is advancing, but widespread adoption faces regulatory, safety, and infrastructure hurdles. Human drivers remain essential for now, especially in complex or rural environments. Role may over time shift into more of a loading/unloading supervisor as physical labour could one day be also aided by robotics.

name: Lawyer
description: AI can assist with legal research and document review, but legal strategy, courtroom advocacy, and client counseling require human judgment and ethical reasoning.

name: Journalist
description: AI can generate basic news reports and summaries, but investigative journalism, interviews, and nuanced storytelling still rely heavily on human insight.

name: Doctor
description: AI can assist with diagnostics and data analysis, but patient care, ethical decision-making, and surgical precision still require human expertise and accountability.

name: Radiologist
description: AI excels at image recognition and can detect anomalies in scans, but human oversight is crucial for complex cases and final diagnosis.

name: Pharmacist
description: AI can automate prescription dispensing and drug interaction checks, but pharmacists provide essential patient guidance and handle nuanced medical decisions.

name: Retail Cashier
description: Self-checkout systems and AI-powered kiosks are increasingly replacing traditional cashier roles, especially in large retail chains.

name: Chef
description: While AI can assist with recipe generation and robotic cooking, the creativity, presentation, and adaptability of chefs remain uniquely human.

name: Waiter/Waitress
description: Some restaurants use robots or tablets for ordering, but human servers offer personalized service, upselling, and emotional engagement.

name: Financial Analyst
description: AI can analyze market trends and generate reports, but strategic investment decisions and client relationships still rely on human judgment.

name: Musician
description: AI can compose music, but emotional expression, live performance, and cultural relevance are deeply tied to human creativity.

name: Actor
description: AI-generated avatars and deepfakes exist, but authentic performance, improvisation, and emotional depth are uniquely human.

name: Warehouse Worker
description: AI and robotics are increasingly used for inventory management, picking, and packing, reducing the need for manual labor in large-scale operations.

name: Pilot
description: Autopilot systems are advanced, but human pilots are essential for decision-making, emergency response, and passenger reassurance.

name: Flight Attendant
description: Customer service, safety procedures, and emergency response require human presence and empathy.

name: Psychologist
description: AI can offer mental health support tools, but therapeutic relationships, empathy, and complex emotional understanding are human strengths.

name: Human Resources
description: AI can screen resumes and schedule interviews, but conflict resolution, culture building, and employee engagement require human insight.

name: Event Planner
description: AI can assist with logistics and scheduling, but creativity, negotiation, and real-time problem-solving are human-driven.

name: Security Guard
description: AI surveillance systems can monitor environments, but physical presence and judgment in unpredictable situations still require humans.

name: Janitor
description: Robotic cleaning systems exist, but adaptability to different environments and detailed cleaning tasks still favor human workers.

name: Plumber
description: AI cannot easily navigate the physical complexity and variability of plumbing systems. Diagnosis and repair require hands-on expertise.

name: Electrician
description: Electrical work involves safety risks, problem-solving, and physical dexterity that are currently beyond AI capabilities.

name: Fashion Designer
description: AI can generate clothing designs, but trend forecasting, cultural relevance, and artistic vision remain human-led.

name: Biologist
description: AI can assist with data analysis and simulations, but fieldwork, hypothesis generation, and experimental design require human intuition and adaptability.

name: Research Scientist
description: AI can accelerate data processing and pattern recognition, but scientific innovation and critical thinking remain human strengths.

name: Dentist
description: AI can aid in diagnostics and treatment planning, but dental procedures require precision, dexterity, and patient interaction.

name: Veterinarian
description: AI can help with diagnostics, but animal care, surgery, and emotional support for pet owners require human expertise.

name: Architect
description: AI can generate building designs and optimize structures, but client collaboration, aesthetic judgment, and regulatory navigation are human-led.

name: Civil Engineer
description: AI can assist with modeling and structural analysis, but on-site decision-making and safety oversight require human involvement.

name: Real Estate Agent
description: AI can match buyers with properties and automate paperwork, but negotiation, local expertise, and client relationships remain human-driven.

name: Barista
description: Automated coffee machines exist, but customer interaction, customization, and caf√© culture still favor human baristas.

name: Bartender
description: Robotic bartenders can mix drinks, but social engagement, improvisation, and hospitality are human strengths.

name: Professional Athlete
description: AI can analyze performance and strategy, but competition, physical skill, and fan engagement are inherently human.

name: Fitness Trainer
description: AI can offer workout plans, but motivation, form correction, and emotional support are best delivered by humans.

name: Mechanic
description: AI can assist with diagnostics, but hands-on repair, improvisation, and customer service still require human skill.

name: Librarian
description: AI can manage cataloging and search systems, but community engagement, curation, and educational support remain human-led.

name: Translator
description: AI translation tools are highly advanced, especially for common languages. Nuance, cultural context, and rare languages still require human translators.

name: Interpreter
description: AI can handle basic live translation, but emotional tone, cultural sensitivity, and real-time adaptation favor human interpreters.

name: Tour Guide
description: AI can provide information, but storytelling, humor, and personal interaction make human guides more engaging.

name: Social Worker
description: AI can assist with case management, but empathy, crisis intervention, and advocacy are deeply human tasks.

name: Politician
description: AI can analyze public opinion and policy impacts, but leadership, persuasion, and democratic representation require human agency.

name: Clergy Member
description: Spiritual guidance, pastoral care, and community leadership are deeply personal and human-centered roles.

name: Professional Gamer
description: AI can play games at superhuman levels, but entertainment value, personality, and fan engagement keep human players relevant.
